# OBS Status [(by ConfuzzedCat)](https://www.twitch.tv/confuzzedcat)
## Description
OBS Status is a way to get info like bitrate and amount of skipped frames.

## Setup
1. Import the code from below.
2. Add the action `OBS Status Setter` to the obs event `StreamStatus`
3. Optional, change the amount of decimal numbers in `OBS Status Config`.

## Commands
It comes with 2 commands, `!bitrate` and `!obs`. `!bitrate` - This just gives back your bitrate. `!obs <info name>` - For this to work you need to write what info you want. The list of info names are below.
```
DroppedFrames
AvgFrames
CpuUsage
FPS
MemUsage
Bitrate
FreeDisk
TotalFrames
OutputSkippedFrames
OutputTotalFrames
IsPreview
IsRecording
IsRecordingPaused
IsReplayBufferOn
RenderMissedFrames
RenderTotalFrames
Strain
Uptime
```
> These are global variables, so they can be used anywhere. 
> 
> {.is-info}
### Examples
```
!bitrate
Output: Bitrate is currently 7080 Kbits per sec.
!obs OBS_cpuUsage
Output: 2.74
```
